long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Pinterest for Twitter
Create boards by pinning directly from twitter.com or with automatic filtering in realtime. For all your tweet curation needs - follow tweets with specific hashtags, from certain people, or with a certain keyword!

Including:
- auto add to your board with filters
- realtime notifications
- directly retweet, reply and favourite
